data.message: I must say I totally think everyone is jealous of eminem's skills and because he is white . He is the best :) always will be . I like the motivational songs . It's what the world needs ! We love you Em . Thank you for your gift of music . Will always   rank you as Rap God :)  haters can go cry a river . Lol :) can't wait to see the movie . And hear new songs ?? :) I'm no wana be but I am your biggest fan !!!! Have been for 11 years , yeah . I totally prefer your motivational and uplifting / strengthening music . you have skills . Use it for the good , you have made a difference in my life for sure
